name: Break It - Cube Smash
description:
Break free from stress as you create havoc breaking cubes inside a dungeon. Smash, break, wreck, destroy the cubes as they are thrown at you. The game features unique handcrafted levels; made with love to be destroyed. Enough of trying to make things work, its time to BREAK IT. 

Features :
• Unique handcrafted levels
• Abundant use of physics in level design to provide a challenging gameplay
• Simple one touch control .Tap to throw, Aim to break.
• Arcade mode with unlimited balls
• Cubes break procedurally , so every impact has a different outcome.
• Power balls to give you that extra edge.
